relation.text: Saturday Oakford 4 Sepr 13 Miſs Parkin came
miſsed -- The Corn is not ripe upon these hills & is uncommonly late this Year
laments grievously that I was not here on Friday
this Season the Hinds are not hunted
Friday -- After breakfast James & I set out
rode thro the Woods & in many places the Vistas are like Enchantment -- Nothing can be be more beautiful . A Road is now
